Articles.Content:
Well, I got bored and decided to draw a rocket in space.

(There\'s no launch yet didn\'t have the time...)

Start:

> ![Zi6_0032.JPG](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/53748526/Images/Zi6_0032.JPG)

Middle:

> ![Zi6_0031.JPG](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/53748526/Images/Zi6_0031.JPG)

End:

> ![Zi6_0030.JPG](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/53748526/Images/Zi6_0030.JPG)

It\'s landing on a mythical planet I made up...

Sorry about image quality, took these with my video camera....

I just realized something... 

I forgot to add the decoupled parts being dropped...
